title: How to Have Shiny Nails Without Using Nail Polish

steps.headline: Cover each nail of one hand with a thin layer of cuticle oil.
Use the coarsest side of the buffer to smooth out ridges and other imperfections.
Smooth the buffer marks with the next coarsest side.
Quickly buff the nail with the next coarsest side of the buffer.
Quickly buff the nail with the smoothest side of the buffer.
steps.description: Your nails should appear to be very shiny.

steps.headline: Follow steps 1-5 for the second hand.

tyn: Recommended 3 way buffer: Tropical Shine brand
Recommended 4 way buffer: Mambi or Dead Sea Spa
Recommended brand: Sally Hansen or OPI
text: Cover each nail of one hand with a thin layer of cuticle oil.  Use the coarsest side of the buffer to smooth out ridges and other imperfections.  Smooth the buffer marks with the next coarsest side.  Quickly buff the nail with the next coarsest side of the buffer. Look for a little shine. Quickly buff the nail with the smoothest side of the buffer. Your nails should appear to be very shiny. Follow steps 1-5 for the second hand.  Finished.
